calculation_log: Used 2024 EU road-freight tkm distribution: 83.1% >30t mapped to 74 gCO2e/tkm; 16.9% ≤30t mapped to 67.63 gCO2e/tkm. EF = 0.831*74 + 0.169*67.63.
Single generic subtype for freight rail → 22 gCO2e/tkm.
Single generic subtype for inland waterway → 31 gCO2e/tkm.

sources: Eurostat short-sea shipping stats; SSS ton-km literature

calculation_log: Weighted average using IATA Nov-2024 global cargo capacity shares: freighter 48.4% (EF 560), belly-hold 51.6% (EF 990). EF_air = 0.484*560 + 0.516*990 = 781.88.
sources: IATA Air Cargo Market Analysis – November 2024 (belly = 51.6%, freighter = 48.4%)
